# THIS FILE HAS BEEN GENERATED BY THE BUILD CONFIGURATION SYSTEM - DO NOT EDIT

set(MINECPP_CRYPTO_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

add_library(minecpp_crypto STATIC)

# Public include headers
target_include_directories(minecpp_crypto PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include)

# Source subdirectory
add_subdirectory("src")

target_link_libraries(minecpp_crypto
        LINK_PUBLIC
        ssl
        crypto
        minecpp_container
        LINK_PRIVATE
)

add_subdirectory("test")
